    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

      Subclasses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CloudInformationService
      A Cloud Information Service (CIS) is an entity that provides cloud resource registration, indexing and discovery services.
      class  CloudSimShutdown
      CloudimShutdown waits for termination of all CloudSim user entities to determine the end of simulation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SimEntity CloudSim.getEntity(int id)
      Get the entity with a given id.
      static SimEntity CloudSim.getEntity(String name)
      Get the entity with a given name.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<SimEntity> CloudSim.getEntityList()
      Returns a list of entities created for the simulation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void CloudSim.addEntity(SimEntity e)
      Add a new entity to the simulation.
      protected static void CloudSim.addEntityDynamically(SimEntity e)
      Internal method used to add a new entity to the simulation when the simulation is running.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.workload.brokers

      class  PerformanceLoggingWebBroker
      A web broker that logs the performance indicators of the virtual machines.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

      Subclasses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggregateSwitch
      This class represents an Aggregate Switch in a Datacenter network.
      class  EdgeSwitch
      This class represents an Edge Switch in a Datacenter network.
      class  NetDatacenterBroker
      NetDatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of Datacenter provider.
      class  NetworkDatacenter
      NetworkDatacenter class is a Datacenter whose hostList are virtualized and networked.
      class  RootSwitch
      This class allows to simulate Root switch which connects Datacenters to external network.
      class  Switch
      Represents a Network Switch.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus

      Subclasses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterBrokerEX
      An extension to the default broker, which allows (i) VM destruction; (ii) definition of events prior to simulation start, which are fired later on; (iii) predefined "life length" of the broker; (iv) billing.
      class  DatacenterEX
      Extended datacenter, that allows for VM booting delays to be modeled.
      class  MonitoringBorkerEX
      A broker which measures the utilisation of its VMs.

      class  HddDataCenter
      A data center capable of executing harddisk cloudlets.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

      Subclasses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerDatacenter
      PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
      class  PowerDatacenterBroker
      A power-aware DatacenterBroker.
      class  PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
      PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware is a class that represents a non-power aware data center in the context of power-aware simulations.
